title: Фиктивный брак
overview: Active and purposeful Lida is studying for a master's degree and works in a Fashion house in St. Petersburg. Her parents own a small weaving factory, and Lida is obsessed with taking the family business to a new level. For the sake of an internship abroad, she is ready to fulfill the condition of the host party in a few days — to be married. With the help of a friend, she quickly finds a man who agrees to arrange a fictitious marriage. Suddenly, Lida's father goes to the hospital with a heart attack, she has to cancel her internship and head the factory. On a business trip, she meets Igor. A stormy romance breaks out between them, which is quickly followed by a marriage proposal. Now Lida urgently needs to find her fictitious husband and get a divorce. But he went on a geological expedition. Lida goes in search of him…
